definition: ethanol C2H5OH/same as alcohol 酒精

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]
alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols

sentences.english: It is mainly extracted by ethanol extract of the finished product obtained Absolute clouds.
sentences.chinese: 本品主要通过乙醇萃取成品的云烟浸膏制得净油。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the determination of alcohol residue in enoxacin gluconate by GC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立葡萄糖酸依诺沙星中乙醇残留量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Study on extraction conditions of flavonoids from skin powder of tartary buckwheat;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究苦荞麦叶中总黄酮类物质的乙醇提取工艺。

sentences.english: The rate of decomposition was not affected by methylene blue and ethanol.
sentences.chinese: 亚甲蓝和乙醇不影响过亚硝酸根的分解速率。

sentences.english: Methods Polysaccharides of Codium fragile were extracted by using hot water extraction and ethanol precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用热水浸提乙醇沉淀法制备刺松藻多糖。

sentences.english: If TOTM is neutralized & washed with alkaline alcohol solution, then its acid-value will be come down validly.
sentences.chinese: 采用碱的乙醇溶液可以有效降低产品酸值。

sentences.english: The ethanol extract of Saxifraga stolonifera Meerb had obvious antimicrobial effect.
sentences.chinese: 所以，虎耳草乙醇提取物具有明显的抑菌活性。

sentences.english: The bill also includes one-year extension of tax credits of ethanol industry policy .
sentences.chinese: 该法案也包括将乙醇行业的税收抵减政策延期一年。

sentences.english: And it was concluded that the renewable capability of cassava-based ethanol was better than that of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 得到木薯乙醇燃料可再生性优于汽油的结论。

sentences.english: But what if ethanol subsidies go away?
sentences.chinese: 但如果没有乙醇补贴呢？

sentences.english: Alcohol dehydrogenase An enzyme that converts ethanol into acetaldehyde (ethanal).
sentences.chinese: 把乙醇转化为乙醛的酶。

sentences.english: The synthesis technologies of glycolic acid were reviewed, and the glycolic acid application was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 评述了的乙醇酸的合成方法，并介绍了其用途。

sentences.english: Objective The extraction technology of total flavones in Fagopyrum tataricum leaves was studied with ethanol as solvent.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究苦荞麦叶中总黄酮类物质的乙醇提取工艺。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the extraction process of total flavonoids with alcohol from Viscum articulatum Burm .
sentences.chinese: 目的用乙醇提取螃蟹脚中总黄酮的最佳工艺。

sentences.english: Characteristics of infrared multiphoton dissociation of ethanol molecules were investigated experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了乙醇分子的红外多光子离解特性。

sentences.english: Different opinions are posed about extending gasohol in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对我国大力推广乙醇汽油提出了不同的看法。

definition: alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
